actions.committee: Senate Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4(s) of title I of article I of the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947, as amended.

summary.text: Modifies the definition of "resident," for purposes of payment of income tax under the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act, to exempt from the exemption for payment of such taxes any elective or appointive officer, or employee, who is domiciled in a State which imposes a tax on the personal income of individuals domiciled therein but with respect to which such officer or employee is not subject during that taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4(s) of title I of article I of the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947, as amended.
